Question: Charmcare Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Charmcare Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- H2-BP24: Wristband type blood pressure monitor
- Wearable and compact design
- Medical-grade accuracy
- Developed algorithm for improved user experience and interface
- CES 2023 Innovation Award Product: Best of Innovation, Honoree
- CES 2022 Innovation Award Product: Best of Innovation, Honoree
- CES 2020 Innovation Award Product: Best of Innovation, Honoree
- Patents on bio-signal technologies
- FDA & CE Registration
- High-performance handheld oximeter
- Versatile bedside pulse oximeter
- Fingertip pulse oximeter
- Focus on wearable medical devices and continuous R&D
- Goal to align with SDG 3.4 for better medical services
- Focus on sustainable consumption and production patterns (SDG 12.7)
- Emphasis on global partnership for sustainable development (SDG 17.16)
Summary_cn:
魅力护理有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

-H2-BP24：腕带式血压监测仪
-可穿戴且紧凑的设计
-医疗级准确度
-开发了改进用户体验和界面的算法
-CES 2023创新奖产品：最佳创新奖、提名者
-CES 2022创新奖产品：最佳创新奖、提名者
-CES 2020创新奖产品：最佳创新奖、提名者
-拥有生物信号技术的专利
-FDA和CE注册
-高性能便携式血氧仪
-多功能床头血氧仪
-指尖血氧仪
-专注于可穿戴医疗设备和持续研发
-目标是与SDG 3.4对齐，提供更好的医疗服务
-专注于可持续的消费和生产模式（SDG 12.7）
-强调全球伙伴关系促进可持续发展（SDG 17.16）
